properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL
   30 NOV BY M/V SW DIAMOND TOWING TWO
   225 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-03.58S 039-54.42W, 21-06.13S 039-50.33W,
   21-10.23S 039-50.32W, 21-04.14S 040-01.49W,
   21-03.57S 040-01.23W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2820/21.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 DEC 21.
